BoolProperty.Name: SuppressStartupBanner
BoolProperty.Description: Runs without displaying standard Microsoft copyright data. (-nologo)

BoolProperty.Name: VerboseOutput
BoolProperty.Description: Displays additional information during manifest generation. (-verbose)

StringProperty.Name: AssemblyIdentity
StringProperty.Description: The identity string contains the attributes of the assemblyIdentity element. (-identity:[identity string])

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalManifestFiles
StringListProperty.Description: Used to specify manifests that need to be processed. (-manifest [manifest1] [manifest2] ...)

StringProperty.Name: InputResourceManifests
StringProperty.Description: Input the manifest from a resource of type RT_MANIFEST with the specified id. (-inputresource:[file];#[resource ID])

BoolProperty.Name: EmbedManifest
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies if the manifest file should be embedded in the assembly or created as a stand-alone file.

StringProperty.Name: OutputManifestFile
StringProperty.Description: Output the manifest to a resource of type RT_MANIFEST with the specified id. (-out:[file];#[resource ID])

StringProperty.Name: ResourceOutputFileName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the output resources file used to embed the manifest into the project output.

StringProperty.Name: DependencyInformationFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the dependency information file used by Visual Studio to track build dependency information for the manifest tool.

StringProperty.Name: OutputResourceManifests
StringProperty.Description: Output the manifest to a resource of type RT_MANIFEST with the specified id. resource_id is restricted to be a non-negative 16 bit number. (-outputresource:file[;[#]resource_id])

StringProperty.Name: ManifestFromManagedAssembly
StringProperty.Description: Generates a manifest from a managed assembly. (-managedassemblyname:[file])

BoolProperty.Name: SuppressDependencyElement
BoolProperty.Description: Used with -managedassembly. suppresses the generation of dependency elements in the final manifest. (-nodependency)

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateCategoryTags
BoolProperty.Description: Used with -managedassembly. -category causes the category tags to be generated. (-category)

BoolProperty.Name: EnableDPIAwareness
BoolProperty.Description: Adds information to the manifest that marks the application as DPI-aware.

StringProperty.Name: TypeLibraryFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the type library to use for regfree COM manifest support. (-tlb:[file])

StringProperty.Name: RegistrarScriptFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the registrar script file to use for regfree COM manifest support. (-rgs:[file])

StringProperty.Name: ComponentFileName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the file name of the component that is built from the .tlb or .rgs specified. (-dll:[file])

StringProperty.Name: ReplacementsFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the file that contains values for replaceable strings in the RGS file. (replacements:[file])

BoolProperty.Name: UpdateFileHashes
BoolProperty.Description: Computes the hash of files specified in the file elements and updates the hash attribute with this value. (hashupdate:[path])

StringProperty.Name: UpdateFileHashesSearchPath
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the search path to use when updating the file hashes.
